title: Create Expert Interview Briefing Document
description: Before an expert interview, an agent must create a briefing document for the consultant conducting the interview.

tasks.description: Research the expert's background, recent publications, and company.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a concise background summary of the expert.

tasks.description: Based on the project's goals, draft a list of 5-7 key questions to ask the expert.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of relevant and insightful questions.

tasks.description: Combine the background summary and the questions into a single, well-structured briefing document.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a complete and helpful briefing document.
